definition: rather than.../與其|与其[yu3 qi2] A 不如[bu4 ru2] B (rather than A, better to B)

sentences.english: It has peculiar character comparing with other interferometers.
sentences.chinese: 與其它干涉儀相比，具有獨特的優點。

sentences.english: A shop assistance hung it on a rack or placed it on a table with many others.
sentences.chinese: 店員把它掛到貨架上，或與其它東西一起擺到桌子上。

sentences.english: They returned to the store with other protesters day after day.
sentences.chinese: 他們與其他抗議者日復一日的來到這個餐館。

sentences.english: Like all drugs，Miacalcic should be kept out of reach of children.
sentences.chinese: 與其他藥物一樣，密鈣息應妥善保存，勿讓兒童接觸。

sentences.english: They wrangled and rowed with other passengers.
sentences.chinese: 他們與其他旅客爭辨吵鬧。

sentences.english: This strain of popular discourse and feeling in China is more patriotic than nationalistic.
sentences.chinese: 這種感覺與其說是民族主義不如說是愛國心。

sentences.english: Instead, check out the company' s reputation through the industry grapevine.
sentences.chinese: 與其這樣做，不如通過行業內線來了解該公司的聲譽。

sentences.english: They're kept away from other chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 它們與其它化學藥品分開貯藏。

sentences.english: Compared with other social insurances, maternity insurance has evident sexual characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 與其他社會保險相比，生育保險具有明顯的性別特徵。

sentences.english: Eventually, the original business was eclipsed by the other holdings.
sentences.chinese: 最終，最初的這家公司與其它財產相比黯然失色。

sentences.english: They also rue the inwardness of Japanese firms that resist co-operating with others.
sentences.chinese: 它們同樣規範日本內部的公司來抵制與其公司的合作。

sentences.english: What is the International Environmental Treaty-making System and What are its Objectives?
sentences.chinese: 國際環境條約的制定系統與其目的爲何？

sentences.english: He decided to debut with several other violinists.
sentences.chinese: 他決定與其他幾名小提琴手一起首次登臺演出。

sentences.english: To develop contacts and coordination with other water resources organizations and with related specialty groups within the AAG .
sentences.chinese: 發展與其他水資源組織或有關研究組的合作。

sentences.english: The amount of solar energy hitting its high-latitude location is now roughly the same as it was when it shut down.
sentences.chinese: 如今到達高緯度地區的太陽能與其關閉時的大致相當。

sentences.english: Hypocrisy is also at play in how Bernanke and his Chinese counterparts are embroiled in a race to the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 伯南克與其中國對手的競次之爭不也是一種虛僞麼。

definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
